headline: Challenger to FICO Credit Scores Gets Green Light for Use in Mortgages
summary: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac’s regulator says VantageScore can now be used to underwrite home loans, weighing on FICO’s stock.

raw.headline: Challenger to FICO Credit Scores Gets Green Light for Use in Mortgages
raw.summary: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac’s regulator says VantageScore can now be used to underwrite home loans, weighing on FICO’s stock.

headline: Equifax Announces Earnings Release Date and Conference Call for Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: Equifax® (NYSE: EFX) will announce its financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025, in a release to be issued on Tuesday, July 22, at 6:30 a.m. Eastern Time (ET).

raw.headline: Equifax Announces Earnings Release Date and Conference Call for Second Quarter 2025 Results
raw.summary: Equifax® (NYSE: EFX) will announce its financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025, in a release to be issued on Tuesday, July 22, at 6:30 a.m. Eastern Time (ET).

headline: Fair Isaac Stock Drops. Changes Are Coming to Fannie and Freddie.
summary: Fannie and Freddie will allow mortgage lenders to use the VantageScore 4.0 model to evaluate borrowers’ creditworthiness.

raw.headline: Fair Isaac Stock Drops. Changes Are Coming to Fannie and Freddie.
raw.summary: Fannie and Freddie will allow mortgage lenders to use the VantageScore 4.0 model to evaluate borrowers’ creditworthiness.

headline: Fair Isaac stock falls after Fannie, Freddie allow VantageScore use
summary: Investing.com -- Fair Isaac Corporation (NYSE:FICO) stock fell 6% today while Equifax (NYSE:EFX) shares rose 3% and TransUnion (NYSE:TRU) gained 4.4% following an announcement that Fannie Mae (OTC:FNMA) and Freddie Mac (OTC:FMCC) will now allow lenders to use the VantageScore 4.0 credit scoring model.
